Allow afghanistan to be certified as a poppy producing nation, which would allow drug companies to purchase their pooie crop for use in producing morphine and other painkillers. There is a pretty serious shortage of painkillers in the world (no, I am not kidding...the US and Europe use them all up leaving none for the rest of the planet). By certifying Afghanistan as a poppy producer, drug companies could leaglly purchase that crop, and they pay roughly twice what the drug lords there do. 
 
 The US opposes this plan, though nobody has said exactly why, it is pretty apparent that it is becuase the only kind of power or control that the current puppet government has there is based on the fact that they hand out the foreign aid, and if the afghan people have an alternative, they loose that leverage.
